name: Freekick TyrenStyle 2 - v1.0 (Tyren)
description: New style for the new design (may 2011) of the website Freekick.org. Mazuffer and Nojd was the original creators of the code, this style just use parts of their styles and adjusts them in my way.
additional_info:
v1.0
- Green background instead of the grass
- Changed textcolor to dark green instead of the blue
- Colored denominations in the matchreports
- Gradient colors on the bottom of the boxes
